title: Password reset policy
text: Users can reset passwords using the account portal. Support agents must never request full credentials.

title: API usage notes
text: Internal services use an API key format like FAKE_API_KEY_<REDACTED>. Do NOT share keys externally. This example is redacted.

title: Account troubleshooting
text: If the user cannot login, confirm email, advise password reset, and verify 2FA settings.

title: Billing FAQ
text: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days. Ask for order ID, not credit card number.
